summary: This appears to be a detention memo from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, likely related to a detention hearing or motion in the Epstein case or a related matter. The document is being shared between parties, indicating ongoing legal proceedings.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email who is sharing the most recent version of a detention memo.

events.title: Detention Memo Submission
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends the most recent version of a detention memo via email.

keyFacts: A detention memo was prepared and shared on July 1, 2020.
The document originates from the Southern District of New York U.S. Attorney's Office.
The email indicates ongoing legal proceedings requiring detention-related arguments.
